description: Phase that allows operators to launch any approved and effective worksheet during recipe execution, presenting instructions and launch options in POMSnet.
intent: To initiate the execution of a worksheet during recipe operation, display instructions and manage its lifecycle including sign-off.

inputs.WorksheetID: Identifier of the worksheet to be launched
inputs.UnitID: Identifier of the unit where the worksheet will run
inputs.IncludeInEBR: Indicator whether the worksheet should be included in the Electronic Batch Record
inputs.ActionsListSelection: Selection of the Launch Worksheet option from the recipe action list

outputs.WorksheetOrderID: Generated order ID for the launched worksheet instance
outputs.WorksheetBatchID: Batch ID associated with the launched worksheet instance
outputs.LaunchTime: Timestamp when the worksheet was launched
outputs.Status: Current status of the worksheet instance
outputs.WorksheetVersion: Version of the worksheet that was launched

preconditions: Worksheet must be approved and effective
Launch Worksheet option must be configured in the recipe's action list
postconditions: Worksheet instance is created and tracked in the Instance Detail section
Authorized sign-off control is displayed for worksheet completion
example_usage: During recipe execution, the operator selects the Launch Worksheet action, reviews the displayed instructions and worksheet details, and signs off upon completion to record the worksheet in the EBR.
